page.title: 16 Visit to Cogges Farm Museum
page.content:
The children dressed as Edwardians and reported:- "The girls changed into their costumes.The dairy maids costume was a plain coloured skirt and a flowery blouse and a white cap.The cooks wore a grey dress with a white apron and cap.I was a cook and Clair showed us the parts of the oven.We made some bread and butter puddings,jam tarts,plain scones,brown scones and oat cakes.Jane and Rosemary made some butter for the scones.Later on I had to fetch some coal.We got one penny for a day's wages."
by Sharon Smith.
